code:
class Solution:
    def maximumLength(self, s: str) -> int:
        # Initialize the result variable
        max_length = -1

        # Iterate through each character in the string
        for i in range(len(s)):
            # For each character, check for special substrings starting with this character
            j = i + 1
            while j < len(s) and s[j] == s[i]:
                j += 1
            # Calculate the length of the current special substring
            length = j - i
            # If the length of the current special substring is greater than 2 (occurs at least thrice),
            # update the max_length if the current length is greater than the current max_length
            if length >= 3:
                max_length = max(max_length, 2)
                # Break the loop as we found a special substring of length at least 3
                break

        return max_length
